snippet: Juan Monáco defeated Gilles Simon to give host Argentina a tie with France after the first two singles matches in the Davis Cup quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: Juan Monáco defeated Gilles Simon to give host Argentina a tie with France after the first two singles matches in the Davis Cup quarterfinals.

headline.seo: Argentina in Tie With France at Davis Cup
headline.main: A Tie for Argentina and France at Davis Cup
